title: TheakaCP
author: TheakaCP
created_time: July 31, 2023, 11:39:48 AMLast edit: August 09, 2023, 11:45:29 AM by TheakaCP
content: I am from the content Specialist and BD team of Cryptopolitan, a web3-based news publishing website with over 𝟏.𝟓 𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐦𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐡𝐥𝐲 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬. The content posted on our website gets syndicated to 𝟑𝟎𝟎+ 𝐰𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐥𝐢𝐤𝐞𝐁𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐅𝐞𝐞𝐝, 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐍𝐞𝐰𝐬, 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐕𝐢𝐞𝐰, 𝐅𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐛𝐨𝐨𝐤 𝐍𝐞𝐰𝐬, 𝐂𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭𝐜𝐚𝐩, 𝐞𝐭𝐜 with a total viewership of more than 10M Visitors.Here is the website link - https://www.cryptopolitan.com/Here is the Media Kit - https://docsend.com/view/f7yidnrju5wn89i3Here are some of our stats from the last few months: 1. 𝟐.𝟓 𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 visitors in April2. 𝟏.𝟕 𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 Visitors in May3. 𝟏.𝟓 𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 Visitors in June 4. Last 3 months 𝟏.𝟗 𝐦𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐦𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐡𝐥𝐲 𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬. 5. Our content is syndicated to 𝟑𝟎𝟎+ 𝐰𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐬6. These syndication websites include popular websites like 𝐁𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐅𝐞𝐞𝐝, 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐍𝐞𝐰𝐬, 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐕𝐢𝐞𝐰, 𝐅𝐁 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬, 𝐂𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐞𝐭𝐜𝐚𝐩, 𝐞𝐭𝐜.Case Studies: Ledger: Goal - Helping Ledger Establish their Educational Crypto AcademyWork Flow -* Creating a story that most crypto newbies can relate to, focusing on conflicting and confusing   influencer messages on social media* Using a story-based approach to create an emotional connection with the audience* We produced these campaign stories in proximity with the media publicity teams at   Ledger & Verizon. I am reaching out for potential collaborations, in case you are looking to partner with more Web3-based news and media websites. Here are some of the advertisement services that we provide: 1. 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞2. 𝐒𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐥𝐞𝐬 3. 𝐑𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰 𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐥𝐞𝐬4. 𝐁𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐀𝐝𝐬 Looking forward to connecting with the founders and builders in the web3 space.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Perhaps you could translate the numbers you mentioned above into more specific figures. For example, what does this average of 1.9 million visitors mean for your potential client?What is the conversion rate? Can you present the statistics of one case, so that we can be convinced of the effectiveness of this kind of promotion?Since this is an unconventional way of advertising and not so well known, can you show a live example?It is also desirable to know the approximate price range for this service.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: If only you could just edit and include your website, that would be nice so we could be able to see for ourselves what you really are talking about.You just got registered with few activities and you are bumping the thread when you have no much engagement here. I will advise you to be constantly engaging in  the community threads and boards. You will definitely get the attention you desire. It is a gradual process which I believe you will understand how it works. With time, you will achieve getting your publication as long as you have a clean, clear intention here.

comments.author: TheakaCP
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 01, 2023, 07:37:36 PMPerhaps you could translate the numbers you mentioned above into more specific figures. For example, what does this average of 1.9 million visitors mean for your potential client?What is the conversion rate? Can you present the statistics of one case, so that we can be convinced of the effectiveness of this kind of promotion?Since this is an unconventional way of advertising and not so well known, can you show a live example?It is also desirable to know the approximate price range for this service. Thanks for your input, appreciate it. Have edited the post and put some of the resources/case studies, that might be helpful in the evaluation.
